targets.rawSql:
select date_trunc('hour', time) as time,
       avg(current) filter (where type = 'MEM')/avg(capacity) filter (where type = 'MEM') as "Mem Utilization",
       avg(current) filter (where type = 'CPU')/avg(capacity) filter (where type = 'CPU') as "CPU Utilization",
       case
          when (count(distinct scoped_oid) - 1)::numeric > 0
          then (count(distinct scoped_oid) - 1)::numeric / count(distinct scoped_oid) 
          else 0 
       end as "N-1 Capacity",
       case
          when (count(distinct scoped_oid) - 2)::numeric > 0
          then (count(distinct scoped_oid) - 2)::numeric / count(distinct scoped_oid) 
          else 0 
       end as "N-2 Capacity"
 from metric m
 join scope s on s.scoped_oid = m.entity_oid
where $__timeFilter(time)
  and s.scoped_type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE'
  and s.seed_oid = $Cluster
  and (start, finish) overlaps ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
  and m.type in ('MEM', 'CPU')
group by 1
order by 1

select time,
       sum(stor_cap) as "Capacity",
       sum(stor_alloc) as "Allocated"
  from
   (select date_trunc('hour', time) as time,
           entity_oid,
           avg(capacity) filter (where type = 'STORAGE_AMOUNT') as stor_cap,
           avg(current) filter (where type = 'STORAGE_PROVISIONED') as stor_alloc
      from metric m
      join scope s on s.scoped_oid = m.entity_oid
     where $__timeFilter(time)
       and s.scoped_type = 'STORAGE'
       and s.seed_oid in ($Cluster)
       and (start, finish) overlaps ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
       and m.type in ('STORAGE_AMOUNT', 'STORAGE_PROVISIONED')
     group by 1, 2) as a
group by time
order by time

select time,
       count(entity_oid) as "Hosts"
  from
   (select date_trunc('hour', time) as time,
           entity_oid
     from metric m
     join scope s on s.scoped_oid = m.entity_oid
    where $__timeFilter(time)
      and s.scoped_type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE'
      and s.seed_oid = $Cluster
      and m.type = 'CPU'
      and (start, finish) overlaps ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
    group by 1, 2
    order by 1, 2) as a
group by time
order by time

       count(entity_oid) as "VMs"
  from
   (select date_trunc('hour', time) as time,
           entity_oid
     from metric m
     join scope s on s.scoped_oid = m.entity_oid
    where $__timeFilter(time)
      and s.scoped_type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'
      and s.seed_oid = $Cluster
      and m.type = 'CPU_PROVISIONED'
      and (start, finish) overlaps ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
    group by 1, 2
    order by 1, 2) as a
group by time
order by time

select date_trunc('hour', time) as time,
       avg(current) filter (where type = 'MEM')/avg(capacity) filter (where type = 'MEM') as "Mem Utilization",
       avg(current) filter (where type = 'CPU')/avg(capacity) filter (where type = 'CPU') as "CPU Utilization",
       case
          when (count(distinct scoped_oid) - 1)::numeric > 0
          then (count(distinct scoped_oid) - 1)::numeric / count(distinct scoped_oid) 
          else 0 
       end as "N-1 Capacity",
       case
          when (count(distinct scoped_oid) - 2)::numeric > 0
          then (count(distinct scoped_oid) - 2)::numeric / count(distinct scoped_oid) 
          else 0 
       end as "N-2 Capacity"
 from metric m
 join scope s on s.scoped_oid = m.entity_oid
where $__timeFilter(time)
  and s.scoped_type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE'
  and s.seed_oid = $Cluster
  and (start, finish) overlaps ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
  and m.type in ('MEM', 'CPU')
group by 1
order by 1

select time,
       sum(stor_cap) as "Capacity",
       sum(stor_alloc) as "Allocated"
  from
   (select date_trunc('hour', time) as time,
           entity_oid,
           avg(capacity) filter (where type = 'STORAGE_AMOUNT') as stor_cap,
           avg(current) filter (where type = 'STORAGE_PROVISIONED') as stor_alloc
      from metric m
      join scope s on s.scoped_oid = m.entity_oid
     where $__timeFilter(time)
       and s.scoped_type = 'STORAGE'
       and s.seed_oid in ($Cluster)
       and (start, finish) overlaps ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
       and m.type in ('STORAGE_AMOUNT', 'STORAGE_PROVISIONED')
     group by 1, 2) as a
group by time
order by time

list.definition:
select name as __text,
            oid as __value
from entity
where type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'
and (first_seen, last_seen) overlaps ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
order by name
list.name: Cluster
list.query:
select name as __text,
            oid as __value
from entity
where type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'
and (first_seen, last_seen) overlaps ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
order by name
